changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.workspace_relationship_authorization AS SELECT t.id, p.name AS product, r.name AS relationship FROM ruleform.workspace_authorization t JOIN ruleform.product p ON t.product = p.id JOIN ruleform.relationship r ON t.relationship = r.id WHERE t.authorization_type = '0';
ALTER TABLE readable.workspace_relationship_authorization OWNER TO core;
